text: Thomas Jok Deng (born 20 March 1997) is an Australian professional soccer player. He plays for Albirex Niigata in the J1 League and for the Australia men's national soccer team (nicknamed the "Socceroos"). Deng was born as a South Sudanese refugee in Nairobi, Kenya. He moved to Adelaide, South Australia in 2003, when he was six years old.http://www.cornerflag.com.au/the- rise-and-rise-of-thomas-deng/https://www.pansa.org.au/thomas-deng/ His older brother, Peter Deng, plays for South Sudan.http://www.cornerflag.com.au/peter- dengs-journey-to-south-sudanese-debut/ ==References== Category:1997 births Category:Australian men's soccer players Category:South Sudanese footballers
title: Thomas Deng
